title: Rani Jhumka: Ruby & Polki Diamond Gold Earrings
features: Intricately designed Jhumka with open filigree work adorned with sparkling Polki diamonds. The top features an eye-catching oval-cut Ruby surrounded by more Polkis, adding a touch of royalty. Delicate pearl drops (Gundlu) enhance the traditional appeal. Features a dome shaped body with floral motifs.
occasions: and even adding a touch of heritage to contemporary outfits. Perfect for a Seemantham or Half-Saree function.
description: A timeless design that beautifully blends traditional South Indian craftsmanship with the brilliance of Polki diamonds and the allure of rubies. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, while the pearl drops add a graceful touch. These Jhumkas are a symbol of heritage and elegance, making them a cherished addition to any jewelry collection.
